messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
If you beat me, you can count on
something rotten coming your way!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Aww!
Why did you beat me?!I hope you get so lost in Wayward Cave
you cry! Boo-hoo-hoo!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH: I had to get my revenge on you.I trained my Pok√©mon while wandering lost in Wayward Cave!
